Hero.description: I don't just code. I design <bold>robust, scalable, and intelligent</bold> digital infrastructures to solve complex problems.

Philosophy.block_1_text: It all starts with a deep understanding of the problem. I deconstruct complexity to find <bold>architectural elegance</bold>.
Philosophy.block_2_text: Rigor, Discipline, Iteration. I code like an aeronautical engineer: every line has a purpose. No room for randomness.
Philosophy.block_3_text: Real impact. I don't chase hype, I chase <highlight>sustainable performance</highlight> and added value for the end user.

Categories.cat_1_desc: Design of complex, high-performance, and SEO-friendly web applications (Next.js, React).
Categories.cat_2_desc: Fluid native applications for iOS and Android with a unified codebase (Flutter/React Native).
Categories.cat_3_desc: Integration of predictive models and intelligent agents to automate processes.
Categories.cat_4_desc: Massive data processing, ETL pipelines, and visualization for decision making.

HookProject.title: AgriConnect
HookProject.subtitle: How I connected farmers to intelligent data.
HookProject.description: A major technical challenge: delivering reliable forecasts to farmers in rural areas with low connectivity. The solution? A robust 'Offline-First' platform powered by AI to analyze agricultural data and guide decisions.

FinalCTA.description: I am available for freelance missions or technical consulting.

About.title: SYSTEM LOGS
About.subtitle: Log: /root/user/efraim/history
About.intro: A robust system architecture is forged under constraint. Here are the patches and updates that built my current kernel.
About.step_1_desc: Kernel initialization. Learning strict rigor and community protocols. <bold>Acquiring fault tolerance:</bold> accepting others' flaws for global system stability.
About.step_2_desc: Background process started in 7th grade (Theory, Word, Excel). Effective coding start at 15. <highlight>Intensive Multitasking:</highlight> juggling complex science homework and late-night coding tutorials.
About.step_3_desc: High-density environment (100 instances/class). Limited resources (oxygen, space). <highlight>Result:</highlight> Development of extreme resilience and ability to perform under high pressure.
About.step_4_desc: Migration to elite environment (Grade 12 Math Major). Top of the class in Mathematics. Logic optimization. Awarded the Türkiye Maarif Foundation scholarship.
About.step_5_desc: Deployed via State Scholarship. Currently in Preparatory Classes (CP1). Compiling theoretical knowledge (Adv. Math) and application passion (Dev).

Project_edutrack.title: EduTrack LMS
Project_edutrack.subtitle: Scalable school management system for West Africa.
Project_edutrack.description: A complete solution to digitize student tracking, grades, and attendance in low-connectivity areas.
Project_edutrack.challenge: Schools lacked reliable infrastructure. The system had to work Offline-First and synchronize seamlessly when the network became available.
Project_edutrack.solution: Used PWA (Progressive Web App) with a local database (IndexedDB) synchronized with PostgreSQL via an optimized GraphQL API.
Project_edutrack.impact: Deployed in 15 schools, managing 50,000+ students, reducing administrative paperwork by 80%.

Project_faso_fintech.title: Faso Fintech App
Project_faso_fintech.subtitle: Decentralized mobile banking for financial inclusion.
Project_faso_fintech.description: A cross-platform mobile application allowing P2P money transfers and bill payments without a traditional bank account.
Project_faso_fintech.challenge: Securing transactions on unstable mobile networks (2G/3G) while ensuring a smooth and reassuring UX for first-time digital users.
Project_faso_fintech.solution: Flutter architecture with end-to-end encryption. 'Lite' mode to save data and aggressive caching system for fluidity.
Project_faso_fintech.impact: Adopted by 10,000 users in the first month. Monthly transaction volume exceeded forecasts by 200%.

Project_sahel_ai.title: Sahel AI Platform
Project_sahel_ai.subtitle: Agricultural predictive analysis via satellite imagery.
Project_sahel_ai.description: An AI platform that analyzes satellite data (Sentinel-2) to predict crop yields and detect early drought zones.
Project_sahel_ai.challenge: Processing terabytes of multispectral images with minimal latency and providing accurate predictions despite the scarcity of local Ground Truth data.
Project_sahel_ai.solution: Computer Vision pipeline (Custom ResNet) with synthetic data augmentation. Deployment of optimized models (ONNX) on local servers.
Project_sahel_ai.impact: Prevention of crop loss in 3 pilot regions. 30% yield increase thanks to targeted irrigation advice.

Project_ouaga_traffic.title: Ouaga Smart Traffic
Project_ouaga_traffic.subtitle: Urban flow optimization via Computer Vision.
Project_ouaga_traffic.description: An intelligent monitoring system deployed at critical intersections to analyze traffic density in real-time and dynamically adjust traffic lights.
Project_ouaga_traffic.challenge: Existing infrastructures are static. The challenge was processing unstable video streams at the edge (Edge Computing) with near-zero latency.
Project_ouaga_traffic.solution: Deployment of optimized YOLOv8 models on NVIDIA Jetson Nano units. Lightweight MQTT communication to a centralized dashboard for the municipality.
Project_ouaga_traffic.impact: 20% reduction in average wait times at equipped intersections. Generation of unique datasets for future urban planning.
